  1. modelisation

Uses of Package
modelisation

  • Classes in modelisation used by modelisation
    Class
    Description
    Argent
    Represents an amount of silver money stored as an item.
    Backpack
    Represents the hero's backpack.
    Combat
    Represents a combat between a hero and multiple enemies.
    CombatState
    Determines Combat State
    Coord
    Position in the game
    Direction
    The direction that the Hero takes
    Donjon
    Represents the dungeon that the Hero will exxplore
    Effect
    Represents an effect applied by a weapon or item during combat.
    Ennemi
    Represents the ennemies that the hero will have to kill
    EnnemyActionType
    Defines the ennemy's actions
    Enter
    Represents an action executed when the hero enters a room.
    Etape
    Represents a single floor (etape) of the dungeon.
    Gold
     
    Hero
    Represents the main hero controlled by the player.
    Item
    Base interface for all items that can be stored in the backpack.
    Or
    Represents a stack of gold coins as an item.
    Position
    Represents the position of the hero in the dungeon: which floor (etape) and which coordinate in the map.
    Rarity
     
    Room
    Represents a room in a dungeon floor.
    RoomType
     
    Treasure
     
    Weapon
    Represents a weapon or usable item placed inside the backpack.
